price: Wakasema: Sisi tutamrairai baba yake; na bila ya shaka tutafanya hayo.
arabic: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ
footnotes: Nduguze wakasema: Tutajaribu kusema na baba yake ageuze rai yake, iondoke khofu yake juu ya mwanawe. Na sisi tunakuhakikishia kuwa hatutokasiri wala kulegalega katika hayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū sanurāwidu ʿanhu abāhu wa-innā lafāʿilūna
translations: We will try to get permission
